import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RomanticBirthdayPage=()=>{const[isPlaying,setIsPlaying]=useState(false);const[showConfetti,setShowConfetti]=useState(false);const[showHearts,setShowHearts]=useState(false);const[showKiss,setShowKiss]=useState(false);const[showFlowers,setShowFlowers]=useState(false);const[showStars,setShowStars]=useState(false);const[showButterflies,setShowButterflies]=useState(false);const[showFireworks,setShowFireworks]=useState(false);const audioRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{// Auto-play background music when component mounts
if(audioRef.current){audioRef.current.volume=0.3;audioRef.current.loop=true;// Try to start music immediately
const startMusicImmediately=()=>{audioRef.current.play().then(()=>{setIsPlaying(true);console.log('Music started immediately!');}).catch(err=>{console.log('Immediate autoplay failed, setting up listeners...');setupInteractionListeners();});};// Set up interaction listeners for when autoplay fails
const setupInteractionListeners=()=>{const startMusicOnInteraction=()=>{console.log('User interaction detected, starting music...');audioRef.current.play().then(()=>{setIsPlaying(true);console.log('Music started on user interaction!');removeAllListeners();}).catch(err=>console.log('Music start failed:',err));};const removeAllListeners=()=>{document.removeEventListener('click',startMusicOnInteraction);document.removeEventListener('touchstart',startMusicOnInteraction);document.removeEventListener('keydown',startMusicOnInteraction);document.removeEventListener('mousemove',startMusicOnInteraction);document.removeEventListener('scroll',startMusicOnInteraction);document.removeEventListener('wheel',startMusicOnInteraction);document.removeEventListener('pointerdown',startMusicOnInteraction);document.removeEventListener('visibilitychange',handleVisibilityChange);window.removeEventListener('focus',startMusicOnInteraction);window.removeEventListener('blur',startMusicOnInteraction);window.removeEventListener('resize',startMusicOnInteraction);};// Add multiple event listeners for maximum compatibility
document.addEventListener('click',startMusicOnInteraction);document.addEventListener('touchstart',startMusicOnInteraction);document.addEventListener('keydown',startMusicOnInteraction);document.addEventListener('mousemove',startMusicOnInteraction);document.addEventListener('scroll',startMusicOnInteraction);document.addEventListener('wheel',startMusicOnInteraction);document.addEventListener('pointerdown',startMusicOnInteraction);// Also try to start music when the page becomes visible
const handleVisibilityChange=()=>{if(!document.hidden&&audioRef.current){audioRef.current.play().then(()=>{setIsPlaying(true);console.log('Music started on visibility change!');removeAllListeners();}).catch(err=>console.log('Music start failed on visibility change:',err));}};document.addEventListener('visibilitychange',handleVisibilityChange);// Try to start music on window events
window.addEventListener('focus',startMusicOnInteraction);window.addEventListener('blur',startMusicOnInteraction);window.addEventListener('resize',startMusicOnInteraction);};// Try to start music immediately
startMusicImmediately();// Also try again after a short delay (sometimes helps with autoplay)
setTimeout(()=>{if(!isPlaying&&audioRef.current){audioRef.current.play().then(()=>{setIsPlaying(true);console.log('Music started on delayed attempt!');}).catch(err=>console.log('Delayed autoplay failed'));}},1000);// Try to start music on any DOM change (very aggressive approach)
const observer=new MutationObserver(()=>{if(!isPlaying&&audioRef.current){audioRef.current.play().then(()=>{setIsPlaying(true);console.log('Music started on DOM change!');observer.disconnect();}).catch(err=>console.log('Music start failed on DOM change'));}});observer.observe(document.body,{childList:true,subtree:true,attributes:true});// Clean up observer after 10 seconds
setTimeout(()=>{observer.disconnect();},10000);// Periodic attempts to start music (very aggressive approach)
const periodicAttempts=setInterval(()=>{if(!isPlaying&&audioRef.current){audioRef.current.play().then(()=>{setIsPlaying(true);console.log('Music started on periodic attempt!');clearInterval(periodicAttempts);}).catch(err=>console.log('Periodic attempt failed'));}},2000);// Stop periodic attempts after 30 seconds
setTimeout(()=>{clearInterval(periodicAttempts);},30000);}},[]);const toggleMusic=()=>{if(isPlaying){audioRef.current.pause();setIsPlaying(false);console.log('Music paused');}else{audioRef.current.play().then(()=>{setIsPlaying(true);console.log('Music started via toggle button');}).catch(err=>{console.log('Failed to start music:',err);// Silently handle error without alerting user
});}};// Helper function to start music if not already playing
const ensureMusicPlaying=()=>{if(!isPlaying&&audioRef.current){audioRef.current.play().then(()=>{setIsPlaying(true);console.log('Music started via button interaction');}).catch(err=>console.log('Music start failed:',err));}};const handleHug=()=>{ensureMusicPlaying();setShowHearts(true);setTimeout(()=>setShowHearts(false),3000);};const
